name: Fantasy Realm: A Land Torn Asunder
description: CLASSIC ROLEPLAYING REIMAGINED Embark on an epic open-world adventure, in which you must unite the survivors of a fantastical apocalypse and strike back against the greatest evil the world has ever known.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0 compliant video card with 512 MB of RAM Storage: 1300 MB available space
